indexPage.title: Services
indexPage.subTitle: For over 6 years, our team has been crafting websites that are both visually stunning and drive business growth. Let's chat and turn your website vision into reality!

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.description: For over 6 years, our expert team has built user-friendly websites that not only captivate visitors but also leave a lasting impact. We offer a collaborative approach, partnering with you from initial concept to successful launch. Together, we will transform your vision into a high-quality, professional website that embodies your brand identity.

needsDiscussion.title: Discussion of Needs
needsDiscussion.description: We work closely with you to define your project goals, functionalities, and specific needs. This ensures a clear roadmap with realistic deadlines and budget for a successful launch.

uxUi.title: UX/UI
uxUi.description: We initiate the design process by crafting website concepts (when necessary). This ensures a visually striking and intuitive interface that aligns perfectly with your brand identity and actively encourages user engagement.

websiteDevelopment.title: Website Development
websiteDevelopment.description: Your vision, brought to life securely.  We leverage proven coding practices to craft secure systems, meticulously designing and testing each feature to guarantee a high-quality website that delivers on your vision.

testing.title: Testing
testing.description: We use real devices for comprehensive testing, guaranteeing website stability, efficiency, and security. This delivers a seamless user experience for your audience.

supportAndMaintenance.title: Support and Maintenance
supportAndMaintenance.description: Our commitment doesn't end at launch. We provide ongoing support for updates and scheduled maintenance, ensuring your website remains optimized and secure.

webDevelopment.title:
Website
Development
webDevelopment.description: In today's digital landscape, a strong online presence is crucial for reaching your target audience. We create custom websites that cater to your specific needs, whether you require a unique design or a powerful e-commerce platform. We can also integrate your website with various systems and tools to streamline your operations.

storeCreation.title:
E-shop
Development
storeCreation.description: Unleash the power of e-commerce: Supercharge your sales, skyrocket brand awareness, and connect with a wider audience. We craft user-friendly interfaces that keep customers engaged, seamlessly integrate essential systems (courier, payment, etc.), and streamline your operations – all while prioritizing security.  Focus on your business goals, and let us handle the e-commerce engine.

siteMaintenance.title:
Website
Maintenance
siteMaintenance.description: Peace of mind for your website: We ensure security, reliability, and performance with regular updates, security patches, content management, and optimization. Free yourself to focus on your core business objectives, while we ensure your website thrives.

digitalExpertise.title:
Digital
Mastery
digitalExpertise.description: Enhance your project strategy with a wide range of services. Our trusted partners in SEO, social media marketing, graphic design, and 2D animation provide a comprehensive solution to amplify your project's visibility and captivate your audience.

webDevelopment.title:

Development
webDevelopment.description: We partner with you to transform your website vision (custom or template design) into reality, from initial concept to successful launch.

storeCreation.title:

storeCreation.description: Streamlined user experience, from intuitive interfaces to integrated systems (courier, payment, etc.).

siteMaintenance.title:

Maintenance
siteMaintenance.description: Updates, performance, content, and security – we handle it all, keeping your site secure and running smoothly.

geoturas.summary: Geoturas offers a range of services, including cadastral surveying of land plots, preparation of topographic plans, and more.
geoturas.keyInfo: The website design was created and programming work was carried out. A query form was implemented and the website was optimized for SEO.

result.title: Result
result.description: Prioritizing user needs, we designed a minimalist website and ensured its functionality. We also integrated a query form for easy communication and analytics tools for informed decision-making.

epsychology.summary: Epsychology offers services aimed at taking care of the mental health needs of society and helping people find a therapist more effectively.
epsychology.keyInfo: The website design was created and transferred to the WordPress system. User profile registration, video tutorial viewing tool, and other features were implemented.

result.title: Result
result.description: Addressing the client's needs, we crafted a website with a user-friendly content management system (CMS) for easy updates.  We seamlessly integrated features like user profile registration, video tutorial viewing, and registration for both psychologists and their clients.  This empowers a streamlined experience, with options for service payments and monthly subscriptions. Powerful analytics tools provide valuable insights, and we even trained the client to manage their website content.

juozasbaranauskas.summary: Juozas Baranauskas helps businesses achieve their sustainable packaging goals. He offers various services to companies looking to create new eco-friendly packaging or adapt existing ones.
juozasbaranauskas.keyInfo: The website design was created and transferred to the WordPress system. A query form was implemented, SEO optimization was performed, and the client was trained to edit the content.

result.title: Result
result.description: Considering the client's goals, we designed a user-friendly website built on a popular content management system. To track website performance, we also implemented analytical data viewing tools. Furthermore, the client received training to independently manage their website content.

packneat.summary: PACKnEAT offers innovative, eco-friendly packaging designed for takeaway and storage of various foods.
packneat.keyInfo: The website design was created and transferred to the WordPress system. A query form was implemented, SEO optimization was performed, and the client was trained to edit the content.

result.title: Result
result.description: Considering the client's vision, we designed a minimalist yet attractive website built on a user-friendly content management system.  For easy communication, we integrated a query form.  To track website performance, we also implemented analytical data viewing tools. Additionally, the client received training to edit their website content independently.
